original_text: And Hilkiah the high priest said to Shaphan the secretary, “I have found the Book of the Law in the house of the Lord.” And Hilkiah gave the book to Shaphan, and he read it.
korean_text: 대제사장 힐기야가 서기관 사반에게 이르되 내가 여호와의 성전에서 율법책을 발견하였노라 하고 힐기야가 그 책을 사반에게 주니 사반이 읽으니라

sentences.original_text: And Hilkiah the high priest said to Shaphan the secretary,
“I have found the Book of the Law in the house of the Lord.”
And Hilkiah gave the book to Shaphan,
